about_the_game:
Ntr story Between Meiko and Akatsuki

This is the Version1.0 of this game, we will making more DLCs to make this game better and better.

Akatsuki, as the main character in the story, you will work hard as everyone else, but something just happened in a wierod way.

There is only two months in this game, try to feel the anxious and depression in this story.

Players can work, rest, and go looking for your girlfriend "Meiko" and check what is going on.

THIS GAME REPRESENTS THE REAL THING IN OUR REAL LIFE

WHAT IS LOVE, WHAT IS LOYALITY, WHAT IS WEALTH

As the player, mostly you dont have the chance to choose what will happen to her

Accept it and let it happen

Sometime letting go is also a type of love

No matter what happens in the game, please be positive in your real life.

。

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains BDSM, sexual acts, sexual assault, cuckold plot.

detailed_description:
Ntr story Between Meiko and Akatsuki

This is the Version1.0 of this game, we will making more DLCs to make this game better and better.

Akatsuki, as the main character in the story, you will work hard as everyone else, but something just happened in a wierod way.

There is only two months in this game, try to feel the anxious and depression in this story.

Players can work, rest, and go looking for your girlfriend "Meiko" and check what is going on.

THIS GAME REPRESENTS THE REAL THING IN OUR REAL LIFE

WHAT IS LOVE, WHAT IS LOYALITY, WHAT IS WEALTH

subs.option_text: 她的爱是一种施舍 - $15.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
